data.title: Wat Lao Salt Lake Buddharam Of Utah
data.meta_site_name: Wat Lao Salt Lake Buddharam Of Utah
data.text:
Dear friends,

I trust this message finds you well. We are excited to share news of our scholarship campaign, designed

to assist individuals aged 5 to 18 participating in the Lao New Year event at Wat Lao SLC on May 5th

and 6th, 2024. The aim is to create a platform for these young artists to connect with their heritage,

express themselves through art, and build intercultural connections.

Mission Overview. Lao New Year is a vibrant celebration of Lao culture, offering a unique chance to

showcase the diversity of the Asian diaspora. However, many young artists face financial barriers

hindering their participation. Our mission is to bridge this gap and provide support to let these talents

shine.

Your Role as a Sponsor. By sponsoring our program, you’ll be recognized as a generous supporter. Your

contribution directly benefits pageant contestants and performers, helping them overcome financial

barriers to participation. Your support empowers these young artists to become ambassadors of their

cultures, fostering understanding and appreciation for the diverse Asian diaspora.

Sponsorship Levels. We invite sponsors at various levels and believe your commitment at the $500 –

$1000 sponsorship level would make a significant impact. Your generosity not only makes a difference in

the lives of these young talents but also contributes to the success and vibrancy of the Lao New Year

event.

Recognition and Gratitude. As a sponsor, your contribution will be acknowledged through event

promotions, social media, and our official program. We’re committed to expressing gratitude in a

meaningful way, ensuring your support is recognized and appreciated by the community.

Join Us in Making a Difference. We sincerely hope you’ll consider joining us in this meaningful

endeavor. Your support not only impacts the Laotian Youth Program but also enriches our community

culturally.

If you have questions or need more details, feel free to contact us. We’re happy to provide additional

information and discuss how your sponsorship can make a difference.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
